Package org.apache.juneau.microservice.jetty

Interface JettyMicroserviceListener

All Superinterfaces:
MicroserviceListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicJettyMicroserviceListener
public interface JettyMicroserviceListener
extends MicroserviceListener
Listener class for Jetty microservice lifecycle events.
